tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HistoricalLandmarks (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  landmark_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  year_established INT,
  historical_significance TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Landmarks (
  landmark_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landmark_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  historical_period TEXT,
  heritage_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PreservationSites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  preservation_type TEXT,
  preservation_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE preservation_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name STRING,
    location STRING,
    curator STRING,
    area_covered DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE heritage_management (
    management_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT REFERENCES preservation_sites(site_id),
    landmark_id INT REFERENCES historical_landmarks(landmark_id),
    management_type STRING,
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE preservation_sites (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    purpose VARCHAR(255),
    year_designated INT
);

CREATE TABLE preservation_actions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    action_date DATE,
    site_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES preservation_sites(id)
);
